[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-datasource-protocol](./harp-datasource-protocol.md) &gt; [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md)

## Theme interface

Map theme is used to define what features are shown and how the map is styled, for example which lightning is used or whether fog should be displayed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Theme 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [$schema](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme._schema.md) | string | The URI of the JSON schema describing themes. |
|  [clearAlpha](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.clearalpha.md) | number | Alpha to be used as a clear background - no map objects.  0-1 |
|  [clearColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.clearcolor.md) | string | Color to be used as a clear background - no map objects.  color-hex |
|  [defaultTextStyle](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.defaulttextstyle.md) | [TextStyleDefinition](./harp-datasource-protocol.textstyledefinition.md) | Define the default text style for styling labels and texts. |
|  [definitions](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.definitions.md) | [Definitions](./harp-datasource-protocol.definitions.md) | The definitions exported by these theme. |
|  [extends](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.extends.md) | string \| [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md) \| Array&lt;string \| [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The base <code>Theme</code>s or <code>theme</code> URLs to extend.<!-- -->If used, base themes are loaded first, and then all the properties from inherited theme overwrite these defined in base theme. |
|  [fog](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.fog.md) | [Fog](./harp-datasource-protocol.fog.md) | Define the fog used in the map scene. |
|  [fontCatalogs](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.fontcatalogs.md) | [FontCatalogConfig](./harp-datasource-protocol.fontcatalogconfig.md)<!-- -->\[\] | List available fonts to be used while rendering text. |
|  [images](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.images.md) | [ImageDefinitions](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagedefinitions.md) | Optional images to be rendered on the map view. |
|  [imageTextures](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.imagetextures.md) | [ImageTexture](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Image textures to be used while rendering geometries on the map view. |
|  [labelPriorities](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.labelpriorities.md) | string\[\] | Optional list of priorities for the screen-space objects created using this style.<!-- -->The name of the <code>category</code> attribute of the screen-space technique (e.g. <code>&quot;text&quot;</code>) must match on the strings defined by this \[\[Theme.labelPriorities\]\], for example:
```json
{
     "labelPriorities": [
         "continent-labels",
         "country-labels",
         "state-labels"
     ],
     "styles": [
         {
             "technique": "text",
             "category": "state-labels"
         }
     ]
}

```
 |
|  [lights](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.lights.md) | [Light](./harp-datasource-protocol.light.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Define the lightning available on the three.js scene. |
|  [poiTables](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.poitables.md) | [PoiTableRef](./harp-datasource-protocol.poitableref.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Optional list of \[\[ThemePoiTableDef\]\]s. |
|  [priorities](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.priorities.md) | [StylePriority](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylepriority.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Optional list of symbolic priorities for the object created using this \[\[Theme\]\].<!-- -->The attribute <code>styleSet</code> and <code>category</code> of the \[\[Technique\]\] are used together with \[\[Theme.priorities\]\] to sort the objects created using this \[\[Theme\]\], for example:
```json
{
     "priorities": [
         { "group": "tilezen", "category": "outline-1" }
     ],
     "styles": [
         {
             "technique": "solid-line",
             "styleSet": "tilezen",
             "category": "outline-1"
         }
     ]
}

```
 |
|  [sky](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.sky.md) | [Sky](./harp-datasource-protocol.sky.md) | Define the style of the sky presented in the map scene. |
|  [styles](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.styles.md) | [Styles](./harp-datasource-protocol.styles.md) | Map styles available for datasources used to render the map. |
|  [textStyles](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.textstyles.md) | [TextStyleDefinition](./harp-datasource-protocol.textstyledefinition.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Define the style to render different types of text used on the map. |
|  [url](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.url.md) | string | Actual URL the theme has been loaded from. |
